---
title: "All Recipes"
---

This page will eventually serve as an index of all submitted recipes.

## Recipes

```{r}
files <- list.files(path = "recipes", pattern = "*.md", full.names = TRUE)
files <- files[!grepl("template-recipe.md", files)]
for (file in files) {
  cat(sprintf("- [%s](%s)\n", basename(file), file))
}
```
